question.text: Which of the following statements is correct?

options.text: The bond length in <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math> is <math><mn>1.128</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Å</mi></math> and <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> is <math><mn>1.115</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Å</mi></math> because during conversion of <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math> to <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>, electron is removed from anti bonding orbital

The bond length in <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math> is <math><mn>1.115</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Å</mi></math> and <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> is <math><mn>1.128</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Å</mi></math> because during conversion of <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math> to <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> electron is removed from bonding orbital

During conversion of <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math> to <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> bond length does not vary because bond order remain same

The bond length in <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math> is <math><mn>1.115</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Å</mi></math> and <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> is <math><mn>1.128</mn><mi> </mi><mi>Å</mi></math> because bond order decreases during conversion of <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math> to <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>

solution.text:
Because of the greater difference in electronegativity between C and O, the energy of the molecular orbitals in CO are in the following order

σ1s2σ1s*2 σ2s2 π2py2 =π2pz2 σ2pz 2σ2s *2

Bond order in CO= 12 10 – 4=3
